name: Deatar Escape
description:
Three mind-bending levels of fast-paced, high-octane gameplay where you need to escape Deatar with your space-ship and evade and/or destroy obstacles in your way.

Are you a bad enough dude to beat this game? Find out!

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Roll: Q, E/Move Mouse Left & Right
  • Shoot: Hold Space/LMB
